Key Match Events: India and Kuwait played out a 0-0 draw in Sunil Chhetri's retirement match
Anwar Ali came the closest to scoring for India in the first-half
The second-half turned out to be a cagey affair, and both sides failed to break the deadlock
India will next face Qatar in the final fixture of this round and need a win to progress
Gurpreet made a great save to parry away a shot
A corner for Kuwait was cleared away
Anwar Ali got lucky as a penalty was not given
Chhangte uses his pace and is about to cross it in for Chhetri, a last ditch tackle sends it for a corner
A good link-up play between Chhangte and Poojary was seen
Anwar Ali's header went off target
A free-kick for India was taken, but the ball flies away, out of the action
A good high press by India broke Kuwait's tempo
A beautiful through ball by Brandon and Chhangte uses his pace, but his last touch isn't good and it gets cleared away for a corner
Post-Match Reflections: Chhetri walks and takes a lap of the ground as the crowd applauds him!
A sad end to Sunil Chhetri's international career!
Miscellaneous Highlights: It was Sunil Chhetri's retirement match as India and Kuwait played out a 0-0 draw in their FIFA World Cup qualifier
The hosts missed plenty of chances in the first-half
India will next face Qatar in the final fixture of this round and need a win to progress
The match was played at the Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata on Thursday
Others: The second-half gets underway and India will be aiming to break the deadlock!
It is half-time as the referee blows his whistle!
A cagey first-half and India will rue their missed chances!
India's high press is breaking Kuwait's tempo every time!
